If someone new has moved into your neighborhood popover to welcome
Go to Japan night and be hospitable to Japanese
Introduce yourself to somebody new at Highrock and ask them about it their favorite experience of hospitality.
Start a book of remembrances. Collect stories of hospitality or create a wall of hospitality.
Stop and take five minutes to talk to a neighbor or coworker.
Be gracious and accommodating in traffic.
Invite someone to meet for coffee or drinks.
Invite someone to join you in participating in an activity you enjoy: walking, biking, the movies, concert, gallery visit, etc.
Invite a single person to dinner.
Offer to bring someone to a Highrock event like Highrocktoberfest, or community groups.
Use the prayer of examen this week. Be attentive to what invitations, affirmations, or challenges come up for you as themes during your prayer time.
Go for a quiet 30 minute walk notice what comes to mind:concerns, anxieties, people, questions, joys- spend some time talking with God about those things.
Introduce yourself to 3 people at soul food after church, learn their names and a little bit about them.
